message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $85?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $92. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still committed to staying within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $88 for the product?

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $88 and $92, so I'm thinking $90 is a fair price. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would you be open to selling the product for $87?
I can see you're really close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $89. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
